meanings.definition: The beliefs or practices of a prig.
meanings.sent1: Her priggisms made her unpopular among her classmates.
meanings.sent2: His priggisms often led to conflicts with his colleagues.
meanings.sent3: Despite his priggisms, he managed to maintain a few close friendships.
meanings.sent4: Her strict adherence to priggisms turned her into an outcast.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's priggisms were evident in the way she enforced rules in the classroom.

meanings.definition: The behavior or attitudes characteristic of a prig.
meanings.sent1: Avoiding social events was one of his priggisms.
meanings.sent2: Her priggisms made it difficult for her to connect with others.
meanings.sent3: His priggisms sometimes made him seem out of touch with reality.
meanings.sent4: She couldn't stand his priggisms when it came to following traditions.
meanings.sent5: The politician's priggisms were evident in his rigid stance on certain issues.
